com.github.protobufel.grammar

Class ProtoFiles.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.protobufel.grammar.ProtoFiles.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ProtoFiles

    public static final class ProtoFiles.Builder
extends Object
    Builds FileDecsriptors/FileDecsriptorProtos based on the specified .proto files, .proto texts, and FileDecsriptorProtos. The errors are reported based on the supplied ANTLRErrorStrategy and ErrorListeners.IBaseProtoErrorListener. The built FileDescriptors and FileDescriptorProtos are canonical, with all types, options, and the rest resolved.

    If customOptionsAsExtensions set to true, the resulted FileDecsriptors and FileDecsriptorProtos will have their custom options resolved as extensions, otherwise as the unknown fields. Furthermore, when ExtensionRegistry is supplied, the custom options' extensions will be build with it, otherwise these extensions will be built as DynamicMessages for the Message types.

    Author:
    protobufel@gmail.com David Tesler

      • isProtocCompatible

        public boolean isProtocCompatible()
        Gets whether to convert a FieldDescriptor's default_field into its regular presentation, or leave as in the original .proto source. The default is false, have it as-is.

      • clearRegistry

        public ProtoFiles.Builder clearRegistry()
        Clears the user supplied ExtensionRegistry used to resolve the custom options into extensions. Will use internal ExtensionRegistry, if customOptionsAsExtensions set to true. The resulted extensions for Message types will be built as DynamicMessages.

      • setRegistry

        public ProtoFiles.Builder setRegistry(com.google.protobuf.ExtensionRegistry registry)
        Supplies the ExtensionRegistry used to resolve the custom options into extensions.

        public ProtoFiles.Builder addFilesByGlob(File baseDir,
                                String globPattern)
        Adds source .proto files, by glob pattern, for processing.
        Parameters:
        baseDir - a base directory to get .proto files from
        globPattern - a canonical glob pattern, including * and **, separated by /

                                 Pattern pattern)
        Adds source .proto files, by regex pattern, for processing.
        Parameters:
        baseDir - a base directory to get .proto files from
        pattern - a file regex pattern, with canonical / separator

      • addFiles

        public ProtoFiles.Builder addFiles(File rootDir,
                          String... protoFiles)
        Adds source .proto files, based on the rootDir.
        Parameters:
        rootDir - a base directory to get .proto files from
        protoFiles - file paths relative to the rootDir

      • addResources

        public ProtoFiles.Builder addResources(URI rootURI,
                              String... uris)
        Adds .proto resources, based on the rootURI. Imports will be treated as URIs.
        Parameters:
        rootURI - a base URI to get .proto resources from
        uris - proto URIs relative to the rootURI

      • buildProtos

        public List<com.google.protobuf.DescriptorProtos.FileDescriptorProto> buildProtos()
        Returns a mutable list of canonical DescriptorProtos.FileDescriptorProtos built based on all supplied sources, in the best-effort original input order, as follows:
        1. based on input FileDescriptorProtos
        2. based on input .proto files/resources
        3. based on input source texts

        Any source proto in the google.protobuf reserved space will cause a validation error. The source descriptor.proto with the google.protobuf package, if present, will be replaced by the runtime singleton DescriptorProtos.getDescriptor(), ensuring the runtime uniqueness of the descriptor.proto.

      • build

        public Map<String,com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.FileDescriptor> build()
        Builds a FileDescriptor map, sorted in the original order, with regard to the reserved space. Any source proto in the google.protobuf reserved space will cause a validation error. The source descriptor.proto with the google.protobuf package, if present, will be replaced by the runtime singleton DescriptorProtos.getDescriptor(), ensuring the runtime uniqueness of the descriptor.proto.
        Returns:
        a sorted FileDescriptor map based on the source protos
        See Also:
        buildProtos()
